content: **nintendo switch lite case crochet pattern** very **easy** pattern to make a cute case for the nintendo switch lite that can be easily adapted for the regular non-lite switch as well more details in the pattern **skill level** beginner you only need to know how to chain double_crochet us and slip_stitch the pattern is written in us terms it s 10 pages long includes written instructions and pictures for every step as well as links to youtube tutorials that show the techniques mentioned in the pattern the kirby patch shown in the pictures is not part of the pattern as it s just a sewn patch **materials** 4 5mm size hook approximately 45g of dk weight yarn scissors you will need approx 45g of dk weight yarn this pattern uses 3 different colors but you can use as many colors as you like if using three you will need approx 15g of each color for this pattern i m using bella coco s confection dk you can use whatever yarn you like but i do recommend using a soft yarn to avoid any accidental scratches on the console you can easily adapt the pattern to use any other yarn weight just measure your starting chain to make sure it matches the final size indicated in the pattern and covers the console no sewing needed as the piece is worked in rounds of row this pattern was designed & created by aliceinwaterdeep if you have any questions about this pattern or need any help feel free to message me anytime on here or on mastodon 1 hope you have fun 1 https //sunny garden/@aliceinwaterdeep
